name: string - required - user friendly
alias: string - required - camel cased unique name
columns: string - required - css grid fraction, eg 1fr:  https://css-tricks.com/introduction-fr-css-unit/

areas.name: string - required - camel cased unique name
areas.column: string - required - a css grid line based value that indicates the number of columns this area
areas.row: string - required - the number of row this area occupies in the grid
